  • Enclosing class:

    public static class PaymentConfiguration.Companion

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PaymentConfiguration getInstance(android.content.Context context)
      Attempts to load a class PaymentConfiguration instance. First attempt to use the class's singleton instance. If unavailable, attempt to load from Store.

      A publishable key from the Dashboard's API keys page.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public PaymentConfiguration getInstance(android.content.Context context)

        Attempts to load a class PaymentConfiguration instance. First attempt to use the class's singleton instance. If unavailable, attempt to load from Store.

        Parameters:
        context - application context
        Returns:
        a class PaymentConfiguration instance, or throw an exception
